participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys nature and has a laid-back approach to life.
participant_1.background: I live off the land and I'm content with my simple life. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. My boyfriend works for NASA. My father recently had a heart attack. I am a goalie.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Creative and friendly, balances technical work with artistic hobbies, and enjoys spending time with pets.
participant_2.background: I am an engineer who sings in my spare time. I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade. I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and really enjoyed it! I try, but my wife is the real chef in the family. I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday.

content.text: It's going pretty well. I just finished cooking dinner and now I'm relaxing watching TV.
Nice, sounds like a good way to spend the evening. I just got back from a walk through the woods thinking about my favorite rock songs.
That sounds peaceful, I love walking through the woods. I wish I could do it more often but it can be hard to find the time.
Yeah it can be, but it's always worth it. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock. What about you?
I like rock too, but I also like a lot of other genres. I'm pretty open to anything that sounds good.
That's cool, I like people who are open minded about music. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Killers, Muse, and Coldplay.
Oh nice, I like all of those bands too! I'm a big fan of The Killers.
Me too, they're one of my favorite bands. I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too, it's always nice to meet someone who likes the same music as you.
